name: Triage Operator
description:
This is a gamejam work for MiniJam128. Because of some things, we delayed for a long time to complete this small demo.

English Introduction

In the full of ruins game world, you must become a member of the rescue team to save people as possible as you can. You can mark a person as red, yellow, or green. The rescue priority of people is decided by the color of the tags. The rest of the rescue team will follow your instructions. Surely, you can mark a person as black, which means the rescue team won’t save him. This will give you more time to search for others.

Go and search for every sufferer under the ruins, check their health condition, and decide the color of their tags.

Operations:

WASD - Moving
Left mouse button - Mark tag for sufferers
Hold right mouse button - Scan sufferers

中文介绍

灾区救援工作中，给每一个伤员标记优先度是一件重要的事，它可以显著提升救援效率。在本游戏中，你操作一个无人机，检查伤员状况并为它们打上标签。

不同救援优先度由高到低对应的标签颜色分别是：红色 -> 黄色 -> 绿色 -> 黑色

操作

WASD - 移动
鼠标左键拖动 - 给伤员打标签
鼠标右键按住 - 扫描伤员
